StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Name
StringTable.String: Smuggler's Hideout Treasure

StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Desc
StringTable.String: Our flagship has stumbled upon an abandoned smuggler's hideout, brimming with a treasure trove of riches. The smuggler is nowhere to be seen. We now face a moral dilemma: should we seize this unexpected bounty or respect the unwritten rules of ownership?

StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Take_Desc
StringTable.String: Claim the Treasure

StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Take_Details
StringTable.String: Taking the treasure could significantly boost our resources, providing a much-needed advantage. However, this action might attract unwanted attention and could tarnish our reputation among other factions.

StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Leave_Desc
StringTable.String: Leave the Treasure Untouched

StringTable.Label: Event_SmugglersTreasure_0x745_Choice_Leave_Details
StringTable.String: Respecting the principle of ownership, we choose to leave the treasure untouched. This may uphold our moral and ethical standards, but we miss out on a potentially significant opportunity to enhance our resources.

StringTable.Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_0xC3B1_Name
StringTable.String: Smuggler's Revenge

StringTable.Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_0xC3B1_Dec
StringTable.String: The smuggler, whose treasure we previously encountered, has returned to seek revenge. Enraged by our actions, they have launched a surprise attack against us with a fleet of ships in our territory. We must prepare to face the consequences of our earlier decision.

StringTable.Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_Choice_1_0xC3B1_Name
StringTable.String: Defend Against the Attack

StringTable.Label: Event_SmuglersRevenge_Choice_1_0xC3B1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's time to face the smuggler's wrath. We must deploy our defenses and repel their attack. This encounter serves as a harsh reminder that our actions, even in the depths of space, can have unexpected and dangerous repercussions.

StringTable.Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_0xB52_Name
StringTable.String: New Shield Technology Discovered

StringTable.Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_0xB52_Desc
StringTable.String: Our flagship has recovered the schematics of a groundbreaking shield technology. This new component, when equipped, promises to add an additional layer of shields to every ship in our fleet, capable of absorbing the first hit from any attack.[BR][BR]Of course, it begs the question, who made this?

StringTable.Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_Choice_Implement_Desc
StringTable.String: We will keep this ship component in mind for future ship designs.

StringTable.Label: Event_AdvancedShieldTechDiscovery_Choice_Implement_Details
StringTable.String: Implementing this technology will provide our fleet with a significant defensive advantage. While it may not withstand sustained assaults, this additional shielding could be the difference in surviving initial enemy strikes, giving us a critical edge in battle.[BR][BR]It will be available in the ship designer.

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_0xA3B2_Name
StringTable.String: Discovery of AI Planetary Monitor Plans

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_0xA3B2_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship has come across ancient plans for a semi-sentient AI designed to monitor and reduce crime on planets.

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Use_Desc
StringTable.String: Implement the AI Planetary Monitor to reduce crime on a selected planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Use_Details
StringTable.String: By implementing these AI plans, we can significantly reduce crime rates, leading to a safer and more productive colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Sell_Desc
StringTable.String: Sell the plans for a substantial amount of credits.

StringTable.Label: Event_AIFindings_Choice_Extract_Desc
StringTable.String: Extract resources from the discovery instead of using the plans.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_0x9D5_Name
StringTable.String: Discovery of Core Tap Plans

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_0x9D5_Desc
StringTable.String: Our fleet has uncovered abandoned plans and a unique power source for a Core Tap, a device capable of harnessing the energy of a planet's core. This find presents us with several lucrative options.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Build_Desc
StringTable.String: Secure the plans.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Build_Details
StringTable.String: Using the plans and power source, we can build a Core Tap on our core worlds, greatly enhancing our production capabilities. This advanced technology could give us a significant advantage but may also carry unknown risks.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Sell_Desc
StringTable.String: Sell the Plans and Power Source

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Sell_Details
StringTable.String: By selling the plans and power source, we could make a substantial profit immediately. This option provides a financial boost but forfeits the opportunity to potentially revolutionize our energy infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Extract_Desc
StringTable.String: Extract Resources from the Power Source

StringTable.Label: Event_CoreTapDiscovery_Choice_Extract_Details
StringTable.String: Extracting the raw resources from the unique power source could yield valuable materials for our current projects, offering an immediate practical benefit but losing the potential of the Core Tap technology.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Name
StringTable.String: Ancient Library Satellite Discovered

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Desc
StringTable.String: Our flagship has stumbled upon a derelict satellite, an ancient library filled with unknown knowledge. Its origins and contents are a mystery, and it presents a unique opportunity to uncover lost secrets or technological advancements.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Study_Desc
StringTable.String: Conduct a Detailed Study

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Study_Details
StringTable.String: By choosing to study the satellite, we can unlock ancient knowledge and giving us an immediate research boost.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Use_Desc
StringTable.String: Sell the Satellite for Immediate Benefits

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Use_Details
StringTable.String: Opting to sell the satellite will bring us much needed hard currency.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Extract_Desc
StringTable.String: Extract the resources from the satellite

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientLibrarySatellite_0xB3E_Choice_Extract_Details
StringTable.String: Extracting the resources from the satellite will give us some Precursor Nanites which may prove useful.

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Name
StringTable.String: Encounter with the Sleeper Ship

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Desc
StringTable.String: Our flagship has encountered a mysterious sleeper ship drifting through space. [BR][BR]Its chambers are filled with alien passengers in cryogenic slumber, on a course set for the deep core of the galaxy. The origin and purpose of their journey remain unknown.

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Allow the Ship to Continue Its Journey

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_1_Details
StringTable.String: Respecting the sleeper ship's voyage, we choose to let it continue on its path to the galaxy's core. This decision upholds the sanctity of their mission, whatever it may be, but leaves us with unanswered questions about their origins and destination.

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_2_Dec
StringTable.String: Terminate the Passengers and Salvage the Ship

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_2_Details
StringTable.String: Choosing to terminate the alien passengers for the sake of salvaging any advanced technology on the sleeper ship is a drastic and morally questionable decision. While it may yield technological gains, it comes with the heavy burden of ending countless alien lives.

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_3_Dec
StringTable.String: Awaken the Passengers and Initiate Contact

StringTable.Label: Event_SleeperShip_0x7A4_Choice_3_Details
StringTable.String: Waking up the alien passengers to initiate contact could provide valuable insights into their culture and technology. However, this decision carries risks, as their reaction to being awakened prematurely and confronted by an unknown species is unpredictable. You gain a colony ship
